titleStmt.title: The true interest of families, or, Directions how parents may be happy in their children, and children in their parents to which is annexed a discourse about the right way of improving our time / by a divine of the Church of England ; with a preface by A. Horneck.
titleStmt.author: Kirkwood, James, 1650?-1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Taylor, and J. Everingham,

notesStmt.note: Contains 3 parts; each part has special t.p.: pt. 1. Advice to parents. London: Printed for S. Lowndes, 1690, pt. 2. Advice to children. London: Printed for S. Lowndes, [1690?], pt. 3.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
